MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY2 postcode area of Kirkcaldy. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.30am to restore the high voltage network to normal after a recent fault and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.35am on the 15th of April 2021.
